{\"title\":\"iOS Components and Frameworks\",\"subtitle\":\"Understanding the Advanced Features of the iOS SDK\",\"authors\":\"Kyle Richter, Joe Keeley\",\"publisher\":\"Addison-Wesley\",\"isbn13\":\"a9780321856715\",\"pages\":\"576\",\"year\":\"2013\",\"rating\":\"3\",\"desc\":\"iOS Components and Frameworks will help you leverage iOS\'s powerful components and frameworks to build apps with outstanding performance, reliability, interactivity, media support, and customization.Pioneering iOS developers Kyle Richter and Joe Keeley illuminate the sophisticated intermediate-to-ad...\",\"price\":\"$23.30\",\"image\":\"Image_01.png\"}
